trans-unit.source: Contains data associated with a workflow change that occurs during the execution of a workflow instance.

> [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] When a workflow change occurs during the execution of a workflow instance and a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile> associated with the workflow instance includes a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint> configured for the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent> event, the runtime tracking infrastructure sets <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord.EventArgs%2A> to TrackingWorkflowChangedEventArgs in the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord> that it sends to the tracking service.
> [!NOTE] > TrackingWorkflowChangedEventArgs is used only by the runtime tracking service to pass information in a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord>.
Gets the changes that occurred to the workflow instance.
A list of <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.WorkflowChangeAction"></xref> objects that specify the changes that occurred to the workflow instance.
An <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref> that represents the root activity of the workflow instance.
